articles.description: In the spot market, gold prices on Friday inched up by Rs 65 to Rs 49,551 per 10 grams in the national capital reflecting gains in the international rates, according to HDFC Securities. Silver prices also jumped Rs 298 to Rs 61,232 per kg.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: Gold and silver futures were steady in the morning trade on Monday as optimism over the vaccine put pressure on prices but assurance of more stimulus kept them attractive.

articles.title: Buy Bharti Airtel, target price Rs 495: ICICI Direct - Economic Times
articles.description: Bharti Airtel Ltd., incorporated in the year 1995, is a Large Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 263585.25 Crore) operating in Telecommunications sector.
articles.content: ICICI Direct has given a buy rating to Bharti Airtel with a target price of Rs 495. The share price moved down by 0.47 per cent from its previous close of Rs 483.50. The stocks last traded price is R… [+757 chars]

articles.title: RBI seeks explanation from HDFC Bank about frequent disruptions in digital operations - Times Now
articles.description: RBI has sought details behind the data centre outage that meant services on the Unified Payments Interface (UPI), ATMs and card channels were unavailable for several hours.
